1.title: Microservices Architecture with Python and Docker
1.excerpt: Complete guide to building scalable microservices architecture with Python, FastAPI and Docker. From design to deployment.
1.content:
Introduction

In the modern development world, microservices architecture has become essential for creating scalable and maintainable applications. This guide walks you through creating a complete architecture with Python and Docker.

1. Architecture Design

A well-designed microservices architecture starts with functional decomposition. Each service should have a single, well-defined responsibility. We'll use FastAPI to create lightweight and performant services.

2. Containerization with Docker

Docker allows encapsulating each microservice in an isolated container. This ensures consistency across development, test, and production environments. We'll create optimized Dockerfiles for Python.

3. Inter-Service Communication

Microservices communicate via REST APIs or asynchronous messages. We'll implement patterns like Circuit Breaker and Retry to ensure system resilience.

4. Monitoring and Observability

A distributed system requires complete observability. We'll integrate logging, metrics, and tracing tools to monitor the health of our services.

Conclusion

Microservices architecture with Python and Docker provides a solid foundation for modern applications. This approach promotes scalability, maintainability, and development agility.
1.author: Edwin Tchamba

2.title: REST API Development with FastAPI and PostgreSQL
2.excerpt: Create performant and secure APIs with FastAPI, JWT authentication, Pydantic validation and PostgreSQL integration.
2.content:
Introduction to FastAPI

FastAPI revolutionizes Python API development with its modern syntax, automatic validation, and interactive documentation. This framework combines performance with ease of use.

1. Environment Setup

We start by setting up a Python virtual environment and installing FastAPI, Uvicorn, SQLAlchemy, and Pydantic. This stack provides everything needed to create robust APIs.

2. Data Modeling

SQLAlchemy allows us to define our data models with an ORM approach. We'll create complex relationships and optimize queries for PostgreSQL.

3. JWT Authentication

JWT authentication secures our endpoints. We'll implement a complete system with refresh tokens, role management, and security middleware.

4. Validation and Serialization

Pydantic ensures automatic validation of input and output data. This approach guarantees consistency and security of our API.

Testing and Documentation

FastAPI automatically generates interactive documentation. We'll add unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.
2.author: Edwin Tchamba

3.title: Machine Learning with Python: Image Classification
3.excerpt: Complete implementation of an image classification model with TensorFlow, Keras and data augmentation techniques.
3.content:
Introduction to Deep Learning

Artificial intelligence transforms how we process visual data. This practical guide walks you through creating an image classification model with TensorFlow and Keras.

1. Data Preparation

Data quality determines model performance. We'll explore preprocessing, normalization, and data augmentation techniques to optimize training.

2. CNN Architecture

Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) excel at image recognition. We'll build an optimized architecture with convolution, pooling, and dropout layers.

3. Training and Optimization

Training requires an optimization strategy. We'll use techniques like early stopping, learning rate reduction, and cross-validation.

4. Evaluation and Deployment

Model evaluation uses metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall. We'll deploy the model with FastAPI to create a prediction API.

Conclusion

Image classification with Python opens many possibilities. This approach can be adapted to various domains: medical, automotive, security, etc.
3.author: Edwin Tchamba

4.title: React Performance Optimization with Advanced Hooks
4.excerpt: React optimization techniques: useMemo, useCallback, React.memo, lazy loading and code splitting for ultra-fast applications.
4.content:
Introduction

Performance is crucial in modern React applications. This guide explores advanced optimization techniques to create smooth and responsive user interfaces.

1. Optimization Hooks

useMemo and useCallback are essential to avoid unnecessary recalculations. We'll see how to use them effectively without falling into over-optimization.

2. Component Memoization

React.memo allows memoizing components and avoiding unnecessary re-renders. We'll explore best practices and pitfalls to avoid.

3. Code Splitting

Code splitting with React.lazy and Suspense improves loading times. We'll implement a progressive loading strategy.

4. List Optimization

Large lists can impact performance. We'll use virtualization and other techniques to maintain fluidity.

Conclusion

React optimization requires a methodical approach. These techniques enable creating performant applications and exceptional user experience.
4.author: Edwin Tchamba

5.title: Application Deployment with Docker and AWS
5.excerpt: Practical guide to deploy Python/React applications on AWS with Docker, ECS, and CI/CD setup with GitHub Actions.
5.content:
Introduction

Modern deployment requires a containerized and automated approach. This guide walks you through deploying applications on AWS with Docker and CI/CD.

1. Containerization

Docker allows encapsulating the application and its dependencies. We'll create production-optimized images with multi-stage Dockerfiles.

2. AWS ECS

Elastic Container Service simplifies container orchestration. We'll configure clusters, services, and tasks for scalable deployment.

3. CI/CD with GitHub Actions

Deployment automation with GitHub Actions ensures quality and speed. We'll implement complete pipelines with testing and deployment.

4. Monitoring and Logs

CloudWatch and other AWS tools allow monitoring the application in production. We'll configure alerts and dashboards.

Conclusion

Deployment on AWS with Docker offers scalability and reliability. This modern approach facilitates application maintenance and evolution.
5.author: Edwin Tchamba

6.title: Mobile Development with React Native and Expo
6.excerpt: Creating cross-platform mobile applications with React Native, Expo, navigation, global state and native API integration.
6.content:
Introduction

React Native enables creating performant mobile applications for iOS and Android with a single codebase. Expo simplifies development and deployment.

1. Expo Setup

Expo CLI facilitates React Native project creation and management. We'll configure the development environment and necessary tools.

2. Navigation

React Navigation provides smooth navigation between screens. We'll implement different navigation types: stack, tab, drawer.

3. State Management

Redux or Context API allow managing the application's global state. We'll choose the appropriate solution based on complexity.

4. Native APIs

Access to native features (camera, geolocation, notifications) enriches user experience. We'll integrate these APIs with Expo.

Conclusion

React Native and Expo offer a complete ecosystem for mobile development. This approach enables creating performant native applications quickly.

7.title: Data Analysis with Pandas and Matplotlib
7.excerpt: Data analysis and visualization techniques with Python: cleaning, transformation, statistical analysis and interactive charts.
7.content:
Introduction

Data analysis is at the heart of modern decision-making. Python with Pandas and Matplotlib offers a complete ecosystem to explore and visualize data.

1. Data Cleaning

Pandas excels at data manipulation. We'll see how to clean, transform, and prepare data for analysis.

2. Exploratory Analysis

Data exploration reveals hidden insights. We'll use statistical techniques to understand patterns and trends.

3. Visualization

Matplotlib and Seaborn allow creating informative charts. We'll explore different visualization types based on context.

4. Automation

Automating analyses with Python scripts improves efficiency. We'll create reusable processing pipelines.

Conclusion

Data analysis with Python transforms raw data into actionable insights. These skills are essential in today's data-driven world.
7.author: Edwin Tchamba

8.title: API Security: JWT, OAuth2 and Best Practices
8.excerpt: Secure your APIs with JWT, OAuth2, rate limiting, data validation and protection against common attacks.
8.content:
Introduction

API security is crucial in the modern ecosystem. This guide covers best practices to protect your APIs against common threats.

1. JWT Authentication

JSON Web Tokens offer stateless and scalable authentication. We'll implement a secure JWT system with refresh tokens.

2. OAuth2

OAuth2 enables secure delegated authorization. We'll configure different flows based on needs: authorization code, client credentials.

3. Rate Limiting

Request rate limiting protects against abuse. We'll implement adaptive rate limiting strategies.

4. Validation and Sanitization

Strict input data validation prevents injections. We'll use robust validation schemas.

Conclusion

API security requires a multi-layered approach. These practices ensure data protection and user trust.
8.author: Edwin Tchamba

9.title: Graphic Design and Professional Visual Identity
9.excerpt: Complete guide to create striking visual identities: logo design, graphic charter, marketing materials and brand consistency.
9.content:
Introduction

Graphic design is the art of visually communicating ideas and emotions. This guide explores creating professional and impactful visual identities.

1. Logo Design

An effective logo is simple, memorable, and timeless. We'll explore design principles and creation techniques with professional tools.

2. Graphic Charter

The graphic charter ensures visual consistency across all media. We'll define colors, typography, spacing, and usage rules.

3. Marketing Materials

Adapting identity to different media (print, digital, signage) requires thoughtful adaptation while maintaining consistency.

4. Color Psychology

Colors influence emotions and perceptions. We'll study the psychological impact of colors in visual communication.

Conclusion

A strong visual identity differentiates a brand and creates emotional connection with the audience. Investment in professional design is profitable long-term.
9.author: Edwin Tchamba
